          <title>
            <string language="en">Linear temperature scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lineare Temperaturskala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échelle linéaire de la température</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escala linear da temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scala lineare di temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμική κλίμακα θερμοκρασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escala linear de la temperatura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show four thermometers of different sizes  that can be linearly scaled to obtain the correct temperature readings.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Celsius</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Celsius scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">linear scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury-in-glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen vier Thermometer der 
unterschiedlichen Größen, die linear eingestuft werden können, um 
die korrekten Temperaturmesswerte zu erreichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes montrent quatre thermomètres des 
différentes tailles qui peuvent être linéairement mesurées pour 
obtenir les lectures correctes de la température.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram quatro termômetros dos 
tamanhos diferentes que podem linear ser escalados para obter as 
leituras corretas da temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi mostrano quattro termometri dei 
formati differenti che possono essere regolati linearmente per 
ottenere le letture corrette di temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν τέσσερα θερμόμετρα των
διαφορετικών μεγεθών που μπορούν να ξελεπιαστούν γραμμικά για να 
λάβουν τις σωστές αναγνώσεις θερμοκρασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran cuatro termómetros de 
diversas tallas que se puedan escalar linear para obtener las lecturas
correctas de la temperatura.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
